sense.def:
Če je ideja, poanta ali pripomba
arguable
, na prvi pogled ni resnična ali pravilna in bi morali o njej podvomiti.

seg.quote: Whether he was right or not is arguable.

sense.def:
To be arguable that something is true
pomeni, da obstajajo dobri razlogi za misel, da nekaj ni resnično.

seg.quote: It is arguable that western civilisation was saved by his actions.
Deforestation is arguably the most serious environmental issue of our time.
